text:
🇨🇳✈️🇸🇩#China’s #vaccine support to #Sudan for life saving. Solidarity in fighting against the pandemic.

On Friday local time, Sudan received #Sinopharm #COVID19 vaccines donated by the Chinese govt. and the Chinese People’s Liberation Army #PLA. @SudanPMHamdok @SUNA_AGENCY https://t.co/AgVLeKKIX9
